paper_abstract: Aiming at the characteristics of human-thinking-centric studies, brain informatics (BI) emphasizes a systematic methodology, in which systematic brain data analysis is a key issue. In this paper, a multiagent system, namely, the global learning scheme for BI, is proposed to perform a data-brain driven process planning. Utilizing the obtained three types of mining workflows, a three-step analytical process can be carried out for multiaspect brain data analysis. The proposed work presents a practical approach toward the data-brain driven systematic brain data analysis. A scenario is provided to demonstrate the significance and usefulness of the proposed approach.
paper_title: Toward the Data-Brain Driven Systematic Brain Data Analysis
